title: I MUST Fix My Dead Phone! I'll need some help…
description:
Check out the Ridge Carry-On Luggage and the rest of their offerings at https://www.ridge.com/LINUS Save 10% and Free Shipping at Ridge by using offer code LINUS!

There was important footage on Linus' Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3 when it went for a little dip in the pool. Can Dan recover the data and save the video?
